verses.t: If{H3884} it had not been Lordthe {H3068} who was on our side, now may Israel{H3478} say{H559};
If{H3884} it had not been Lordthe {H3068} who was on our side, when men{H120} rose up{H6965} against us:
Then{H233} they had swallowed us up{H1104} quick{H2416}, when their wrath{H639} was kindled{H2734} against us:
Then{H233} the waters{H4325} had overwhelmed{H7857} us, the stream{H5158} had gone over{H5674} our soul{H5315}:
Then{H233} the proud{H2121} waters{H4325} had gone over{H5674} our soul{H5315}.
Blessed{H1288} be Lordthe {H3068}, who hath not given{H5414} us as a prey{H2964} to their teeth{H8127}.
Our soul{H5315} is escaped{H4422} as a bird{H6833} out of the snare{H6341} of the fowlers{H3369}: the snare{H6341} is broken{H7665}, and we are escaped{H4422}.
Our help{H5828} is in the name{H8034} Lordof the {H3068}, who made{H6213} heaven{H8064} and earth{H776}.
